html:
Hello Engineers,

We‚Äôre excited to invite you to a special live Q&A session featuring Marcin Moskala, one of the top Kotlin trainers in the industry!

This is your chance to dive deeper into Kotlin, ask questions, and connect with an expert who truly knows the ins and outs of the language.

üóìÔ∏è When: 27th August 2024
üïí Time: 15:00 UTC+2
‚è≥ Duration: About 1 hour

During this session, Marcin will guide us through the fascinating world of Coroutines, shedding light on their power and potential risks. He‚Äôll start with a quick overview of what makes Coroutines so unique and how they can enhance modern programming.

And here‚Äôs something special:
We‚Äôre giving a free ticket worth 400 euros to one lucky attendee! This ticket grants you access to our upcoming workshop, Kotlin for Developers, taking place on 25‚Äì27 September 2024.
